DOC.detailed_description: We administer three drug : testosterone gel ( T ) , anastrozole , acyline . We want see effect stem cell hormone level blood . Acyline suppress luteinizing hormone ( LH ) follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) , hormone make pituitary gland , thus block signal brain cause testis make testosterone . Therefore acyline block testosterone production . Some men may experience side effect hot flash irritability low level T cause acyline . We study whether add T acyline reduce eliminate side effect . Since heart disease common problem men want know effect male hormonal contraception cardiovascular system . One way evaluate risk measure number progenitor cell type cholesterol blood . Progenitor cell cell travel blood go area blood vessel injury help repair damage amd may help prevent heart attack stokes . This `` good '' cholesterol think protect people heart attack stroke . Therefore , study test effect T estrogen progenitor cell blood understand HDL cholesterol men receive testosterone need . Acyline experimental drug . The FDA allow use research small number volunteer . So far , 125 men receive acyline . Anastrozole drug block production estrogen testosterone . Anastrozole give men safely past . Anastrozole approve use men also experimental drug . Testosterone gel also use study . It FDA approve use men low testosterone level .
DOC.criteria: Males age 1855 year Normal serum total testosterone ( 300 ng/dl1000 ng/dl ) Normal LH FSH level Taking regular medication Normal baseline serum hematology , chemistry liver function test Agrees donate blood study Agrees use form contraception study Subject must able comply study procedure Clinically significant screening assessment relevant disease , allergy surgery , reveal history , physical examination and/or laboratory assessment , may limit participation prevent completion study History prostate cancer , breast cancer , benign prostatic hypertrophy Prostatespecific antigen ( PSA ) > 3.0 History regular , chronic testosterone anabolic steroid use past year Chronic medical illness , prostate disease , cardiovascular disease History bleeding disorder need anticoagulation Skin condition might interfere exacerbate T gel use Sitting systolic blood pressure > 180mm Hg < 90 mm Hg sit diastolic blood pressure > 110 mm Hg < 60 mm Hg . History clinically significant , untreated sleep apnea Participation another drugrelated research study within past 2 month Participating regular physical relationship pregnant woman History hypersensitivity study medication ( T gel , anastrozole , acyline ) History medical surgical therapy benign prostatic hypertrophy Hematocrit > 55 % History drug alcohol abuse within last 6 month Abnormal digital rectal exam screen
